trans-unit.source: Associates an action taken on an activity designer on the workflow design surface with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Associa uma ação executada em um designer de atividade na superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho com o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: A designer action is a user action that is performed when you activate a designer glyph on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um designer é uma ação do usuário que é executada quando você ativar um glifo designer na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction> class is used to indicate your actions.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction> classe é usada para indicar suas ações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction> class is also used to add the task items by the adornment service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction> classe também é usada para adicionar os itens de tarefa pelo serviço de adorno.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> on which the designer action is taken.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> no qual a ação designer é realizada.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the identifier of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que representa o identificador do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o texto associado à ação do designer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> class by using an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />, an integer, and a string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> usando um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />, um inteiro e uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="activityDesigner" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activityDesigner" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="text" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />) or its length is 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="text" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" />) ou seu tamanho é 0.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> on which the designer action is to appear.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> no qual a ação designer deve aparecer.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the identifier of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que representa o identificador do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o texto associado à ação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser associado à ação de designer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> class by using <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />, an integer, a string, and an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> usando um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />, um inteiro, uma cadeia de caracteres e um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="activityDesigner" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activityDesigner" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="text" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />) or its length is 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="text" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" />) ou seu tamanho é 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier for the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador para a ação de designer.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the identifier for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o identificador para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the image associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a imagem associada à ação de designer.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> que está associado a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction)" /> method of the activity designer associated with the current designer action.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o método <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction)" /> do designer de atividade associado com a ação de designer atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction%2A> method is called when you click a validation error displayed by the activity designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction%2A> método é chamado quando você clicar em um erro de validação exibido pelo designer de atividade na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Represents the name of the property that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da propriedade à qual o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the name of the property.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In the property editor, the property that corresponds to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.PropertyName%2A> of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction> provides a visual cue that signals the presence of an associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction>.
trans-unit.target: O editor de propriedade, a propriedade que corresponde do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.PropertyName%2A> do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction> fornece uma indicação visual que indica a presença de um tipo de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto associado à ação de designer.

trans-unit.source: A string value that represents the text associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de cadeia de caracteres que representa o texto associado a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of user data associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um dicionário de dados de usuário associados à ação de designer.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that represents the user data associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que representa os dados de usuário associados a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction" />.
